annual_fare_revenue.label: Placeholder FY assumption for reporting only

annual_advertising_revenue.label: Placeholder FY assumption for reporting only

annual_external_subsidies.label: Placeholder FY assumption for reporting only

annual_budget_ceiling.label: Placeholder FY operating budget ceiling for reporting only

labor_cost_per_vehicle_hour.label: Placeholder blended labor rate pending route-hour estimation

maintenance_cost_per_vehicle_mile.label: Placeholder maintenance rate pending route-mile estimation

energy_cost_per_vehicle_mile.label: Placeholder fuel-energy rate pending route-mile estimation

annualized_capital_cost_per_vehicle.label: Placeholder annualized capital proxy per additional bus

average_operating_speed_mph.label: Placeholder average in-service speed for later route-hour estimation

deadhead_multiplier.label: Placeholder deadhead uplift for later route-mile estimation

dwell_recovery_multiplier.label: Placeholder dwell-recovery uplift for later route-hour estimation

weekday_service_days_per_year.label: Weekday-only service assumption for later annualization
